wallDescription: A simple wall of rough hewn stone

gameObjects.name: Dead body
gameObjects.description: The body of an older inmate, half rotten. You find some items on him:

gameObjects.name: passage to the next room
gameObjects.description: A surprisingly sturdy wooden door, with a rusty keyhole.

gameObjects.name: Prison wall
gameObjects.description: Through the bars of your prison cell, you can see the sentinel guarding your door, crushed to death by the fallen debris.
